Package arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian

Class AdhesionHamiltonian

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian.AdhesionHamiltonian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hamiltonian
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdhesionHamiltonian2D, AdhesionHamiltonian3D
    public abstract class AdhesionHamiltonian
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for adhesion energy.

      • getDelta

        public double getDelta​(int sourceID,
                       int targetID,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Gets change in energy.

        Adhesion energy is calculated by summing across adhesion of the given voxel to all non-self neighbor voxels. Change in adhesion energy is taken as the difference in adhesion energies for the source and target IDs.

        Specified by:
        getDelta in interface Hamiltonian
        Parameters:
        sourceID - the id of the source voxel
        targetID - the id of the target voxel
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        Returns:
        the change in energy

      • getDelta

        public double getDelta​(int id,
                       int sourceRegion,
                       int targetRegion,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Gets change in energy for region.

        Adhesion energy is calculated by summing across adhesion of the given voxel to all non-same regions with the same ID. Change in adhesion energy is taken as the difference in adhesion energies for the source and target regions.

        Specified by:
        getDelta in interface Hamiltonian
        Parameters:
        id - the voxel id
        sourceRegion - the region of the source voxel
        targetRegion - the region of the source voxel
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        Returns:
        the change in energy
